WOW! just WOW! Works PERFECTLY!!!!! all u need to do is:

1. Mount the iso file with magic iso or whatever program you use.

2. Open the cd by going Start- Computer, right click on: Need for speed most wanted and click on open in a new window.

3. Search for the autorun.exe with an EA icon and double click on it. It should install the game. If prompted, go into the crack folder and double click on the "Keygen" Click on the down arrow and select Need for Speed Most Wanted. Click "Generate" and enter the key in the key box. 

4. Now the game should install fine and you will be able to play it. If you wish to open the game go into Computer and double click on Need for Speed Most Wanted.

Hope this helped!

I got the solution finally... 

You are right babchar2002, you need to do the following: 

1. After you mount the game image, copy all the files to you hard drive in one folder for example NFSMW. 

2. Open the NFSMWAutorun folder..and then open the file autorun.cfg with Notepad. 

3. Look for the parameter DirectXVersion=9.0c and change the 9.0c to 0 and save the file. 

4. Run the Setup from your hard drive folder and ENJOY!! 

I hope this helps...

.....................................................................

in other words for you people with no knowledge of anything. go to computer. open your local hard drive. right click and make a "new folder" then paste all the files from the CD into that file. after that fallow the directions and run it. it will work. the issue is that the Direct X is running to install 9.0c only. simply change the value to "0" and it does not need the specific direct X. 

I hope this forum info and my info helped. Im playing it now and it runs great. support to seed
